thread.title: Bungling burglar flees Victorian pub after no staff answer his cries - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Bungling burglar flees Victorian pub after no staff answer his cries - Yahoo7

author: News On February
title: Bungling burglar flees Victorian pub after no staff answer his cries - Yahoo7
text:
Share Bungling burglar flees Victorian pub after no staff answer his cries - Yahoo7 Victoria police are looking for a man filmed slamming a blade on the counter of a bar in an attempted armed robbery only to leave empty handed when he couldn't get anyone's attention. Close Bumbling burglar walks away empty handed UP NEXT VIDEO A bumbling bandit has been thwarted in his attempted armed robbery in Wangaratta. He left empty-handed when nobody came to the counter. Source: 7 News Bumbling burglar walks away empty handed 
Police have released a video of the attempted robbery at a Wangaratta hotel on February 19. 
The unknown man entered the Old Town and Country Tavern on the corner of Mason and Greta streets about 10.15pm carrying a plastic bag and a sharp object. 
With his hoodie pulled tight over his head, the man walked toward a counter near the gaming room and banged the blade on the counter. The man entered the Old Town and Country Tavern about 10.30pm. Source: Victoria Police He was carrying a plastic bag and a knife. 
Failing to catch the attention of any staff, the man left shortly after. 
A dark blue Holden Commodore sedan was spotted leaving the scene, police said in a statement. The man slammed the knife on the counter for attention, but left empty handed. Anyone who recognises the man is asked to contact police. 
Police are seeking a man described as 180 centimetres tall, wearing a red and blue flannelette jacket with a grey hood, yellow gloves and blue Adidas pants with white stripes down the side. 
Anyone with information is encouraged to call Crime Stoppers 1800 333 000 or use the Crime Stoppers online reporting page . Close Shop attendant scares off armed robber with crowbar UP NEXT VIDEO A shop attendant in Queensland has taken a stand against an offender during an attempted armed robbery on the Gold Coast. Source: Queensland Police Shop attendant scares off armed robber with crowbar
